item.title: Video Editor, Real Estate 🏡 - Upwork
item.description:
The ideal editing master for this job has these skills 👇

- Color Grading Slog 3
- Speed Ramping
- Understand how to make a Story in post
- Understand how to mask transition
- Videos will be 50 - 120 seconds long
- Ideally work in Premier pro
- Video turn around time: 24hrs ideal. Latest 48hrs
- Solid communication

Currently we have a video editor and are looking to add another to the team. We’ll give you all the footage and music you need. You simply need to put them together in a stylish manner and add SFX. I am a video editor myself and seek someone who will do the job better than I.

We’ll start you off slow, ramp up the work once we see your quality.

Budget: $60
Posted On: June 30, 2024 00:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Motion Retouching, Visual Effects, Video Transition, Video Editing
Skills: Color Grading, Dynamic Transition, Motion Retouching, Visual Effects, Video Transition, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Native Swahili speaking YouTube Vlogger - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to create and post 2 YouTube videos per week. The videos will be for learners of Swahili, 100% Swahili, and 5 to 15 minutes long each. You will also be responsible for managing the channel – uploading the videos, creating playlists when it makes sense, etc. You must be a native Swahili speaker, capable of conversing without switching to English, and looking presentable on video. The videos must be of good quality; easy to watch and listen to. The pay is $20 USD per video. If we like your work, this job could last months or even years.

If you are interested in this job, please send a link to at least one YouTube video of yourself.


Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 00:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Voice Talent, Swahili
Skills: Voice Talent, Swahili
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Online Video Presentation Coach - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced and dynamic online video presentation coach to help us create more engaging videos and improve our on-camera presence. As a coach, you will guide us in developing effective communication skills, enhancing our storytelling abilities, and delivering compelling content. Your expertise will be instrumental in improving our video production quality and overall performance.

Key Skills:
- Expertise in video presentation and storytelling techniques
- Proficient in camera presence and body language
- Strong knowledge of video editing software
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 30, 2024 00:12 UTC
Category: Presentation Design
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Graphic Design, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Education, Graphic Design, Videography
Country: Australia

item.title: Short-Form Humor/Comedy Video Creator for Educational Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented, creative, and hilarious individual to produce short-form videos (Instagram Reels / YouTube Shorts / TikToks) for our educational brand. The ideal candidate will have a strong pulse of current social trends and the ability to leverage them to create engaging and on-brand content for Fusion Academy. As a video creator, you will be responsible for brainstorming ideas, scripting, filming, and editing high-quality videos that align with our brand's objectives. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a passion for education. If you have a knack for storytelling and the ability to make complex topics accessible and entertaining, we want to hear from you!

Brand: Fusion Academy
IG: https://www.instagram.com/fusion_academy/

Skills required:
- Video production and editing
- Scriptwriting
- Knowledge of social media platforms
- Creativity and innovation
- Attention to detail

Size: Medium
Duration: 1 to 3 months
Expertise: Intermediate


Posted On: June 30, 2024 00:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Education
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Education
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Intro/Outro/Video for Mental Health YT channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a skilled video editor to help create an engaging intro and outro video for our YouTube channel. I may also consider a long-term collaboration for ongoing video editing work. The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing, animation and a good understanding of YouTube content. Attention to detail and creativity are essential for this role. Our goal is to create visually appealing and professional videos that captivate our audience. If you have the skills and passion for creating high-quality videos, we would love to hear from you.

Skills needed:
- 2D Animation
- Variety of Animation style
- Video editing
- Creativity
- Attention to detail
- Knowledge of YouTube content

Budget: $45

item.title: Create short 3D zoom in After effects - Upwork
item.description:
I need an after effects artist who is familiar with the 3D camera to create a short parallax zoom in scene. I will provide seperate photoshop files and png images which have all been prepared for this so you will only need to arrange the layers on the z axis and then animate the camera. The scene requires a simple zoom no longer that 7 seconds.

The project will need to be delivered as an after effect file as this is part of a larger project.

This is urgent so please only reach out if you can start this and deliver at the latest tomorrow.  Please provide a time estimate so I can anticipate budget.

Hourly Range: $24.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 23:51 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe After Effects
Skills: Adobe After Effects
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Top Talent! - TikTok & YT shorts meme video - Ai voice dub - Upwork
item.description:
One short meme video( sized to  yt shorts and  TikTok).

Take the classic Steve Ballmer “Developers, Developers, Developers” video of him jumping around stage and AI dub his voice screaming “Direct Deposit, Direct Deposit, Direct Deposit!” The ai audio should replicate the passion of Steve’s original howls.

Key acceptance is how much it “hits” or vibes.

Get creative with play length of time, framing, angles, etc just make it POP!!

Deliverables:
1) full quality version
2) a new yt shorts account with login/password to the account and the vid uploaded and playable
3) a new TikTok account with login/password to the account and the vid uploaded and playable
3) reels upload is an added bonus but not needed

Revisions:
As many as needed to something that pops!




Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 29, 2024 23:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, AI Audio Generation
Skills: TikTok Video, YouTube Shorts, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, AI Audio Generation
Country: United States
click to apply
